description.raw:
The spelling mistake \(`achors`\) was responsible for the following warning msgs:

```
[GUI] [Wrn] [Application.cc:649] [QT] file::/GzScene3D/GzScene3D.qml:59: TypeError: Cannot read property 'left' of undefined
[GUI] [Wrn] [Application.cc:649] [QT] file::/GzScene3D/GzScene3D.qml:58: TypeError: Cannot read property 'top' of undefined
```

turns out we don’t need these anchors. The text label displayed when in camera follow mode correctly defaults to the top left corner. So the anchors are removed.

‌
